steps.name: I am on the home page

elements.name: Add a single product to the cart

steps.name: I search for "Ноутбук Lenovo ideapad Slim 5 16ABR8 16\" (82XG009HRA) cloud grey"
I add the product to the cart
I should see "Ноутбук Lenovo ideapad Slim 5 16ABR8 16\" (82XG009HRA) cloud grey" in the cart
I am on the home page

elements.name: Add a single product to the cart

steps.name: I search for "Мишка Logitech Wireless Mouse M185 black/red (910-002240)"
I add the product to the cart
I should see "Мишка Logitech Wireless Mouse M185 black/red (910-002240)" in the cart
I am on the home page

elements.name: Add two different products to the cart

steps.name: I search for "Ноутбук Lenovo ideapad Slim 5 16ABR8 16\" (82XG009HRA) cloud grey"
I add the product to the cart
I go back to the home page
I search for "Мишка Logitech Wireless Mouse M185 black/red (910-002240)"

I should see 2 products in the cart
the user is on the home page
the page title should contain "Епіцентр"
the user is on the home page
the user searches for "Ноутбук"
the URL should contain "noutbuki"
